headline: Murder charge laid in west Edmonton shooting death - Edmonton | Globalnews.ca

annotations.paragraph: The Edmonton Police Service has charged a 21-year-old man with murder after another man was found dead in the west end earlier this week.
annotations.reason: This paragraph provides the main news of the murder charge being laid.

annotations.paragraph: A body was found in a vehicle in The Hamptons area just after midnight on Tuesday.
annotations.reason: This paragraph gives specific details about the location and timing of the incident.

annotations.paragraph: Police said patrol officers with the west division responded to a disturbance near 56 Avenue and 199 Street in the west end neighbourhood.
annotations.reason: This paragraph provides context about the police response to the incident.

annotations.paragraph: Upon arrival, police said the officers found a vehicle with a dead man inside. His death was determined to be suspicious.
annotations.reason: This paragraph adds details about the discovery and initial assessment of the death.

annotations.paragraph: Get the day's top stories from Toronto and surrounding communities, delivered to your inbox once a day.
annotations.reason: This is a promotional statement unrelated to the article's main story.

annotations.paragraph: An autopsy was done on Thursday when the medical examiner determined Emanuelle Moraga, 33, of Saskatoon died of multiple gunshot wounds and his death is homicide.
annotations.reason: Provides essential details about the victim and cause of death.

annotations.paragraph: Two men were taken into custody on Tuesday. Currently, the EPS homicide section has charged one of them.
annotations.reason: Gives important information about the suspects and charges.
This is a placeholder for an advertisement, not part of the article content.

annotations.paragraph: Tolga Boyaci, 21, of Edmonton has been charged with second-degree murder.
annotations.reason: Identifies the individual charged and the specific charge.

annotations.paragraph: The other man has since been released, police said.
annotations.reason: Updates on the status of the second suspect.
